title: App Launches Correctly
description: DAW Git App starts without error and loads previous project path.

title: Project Path Saved/Loaded
description: Reopen app and it remembers last loaded project path.

title: Commit Snapshot
description: Make a new commit and check that it appears in the commit table.

title: Switch Commit
description: Select an earlier commit and ensure DAW project loads that version.

title: Switch Branch
description: Switch to a different branch from dropdown and ensure correct version loads.

title: Start New Version Line
description: Use 🎼 button to create a new branch from current commit. Confirm new branch exists.

title: Role Tagging (Main Mix)
description: Click 'Main Mix' and confirm commit gets role tag saved and shown in UI.

title: Role Tagging (Creative Take)
description: Click 'Creative Take' and verify tag shows.

title: Role Tagging (Alt Mixdown)
description: Click 'Alt Mixdown' and verify tag shows.

title: Commit Role Persists Across Restart
description: Close and reopen app — role tag still visible for commit.

title: Detached HEAD Warning
description: Checkout an old commit. Confirm app warns you're not on latest.

title: Untracked Files Warning
description: Add a non-committed file and switch commits. Confirm warning shown.

title: Unsaved Changes Warning
description: Modify .als/.logicx file and try to switch commits. Confirm backup warning.

title: Open in Ableton
description: Click 🎧 to open checked out .als file in Ableton. Confirm correct version opens.

title: Delete Commit
description: Select a commit and delete. Confirm it’s removed from Git and UI.

title: Start From Placeholder
description: New version line adds placeholder .als and it can be committed.

title: Status Label Updates
description: Status label updates between clean, dirty, detached states.

title: Pages View Navigation
description: Open Pages view and switch snapshots using cards.
